price: 122. Markii labo kooxood oo idinka mid ah goosteen inay cabsi muujiyaan21, Alle baana ahaa Gargaarahooda. Ee Alle uun ha isku halleeyeen oo tala saarteen mu’miniintu.
arabic: إِذۡ هَمَّت طَّآئِفَتَانِ مِنكُمۡ أَن تَفۡشَلَا وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّهُمَاۗ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: 21. Waxay ahaayeen Banuu Salama oo qabiilka Khazraj ah, iyo Banuu Xaaritha oo qabiilka Aws ah, oo labadaba ka tirsanaa Muslimiinta.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh hammat ṭāifatāni minkum an tafshalā wal-lahu waliyyuhumā waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
